Package pl.polsl.lab.bartosz.sosnica.sudoku.view

package pl.polsl.lab.bartosz.sosnica.sudoku.view
This package contains the view classes for the Sudoku game. The views are responsible for displaying the game state to the user and handling user input, both through the console and graphical interfaces.

Views:

  • UserView: Handles text-based interaction with the user, including console input and output.
  • SudokuGameView: Manages the graphical display of the Sudoku game board.
  • UserInputGuiView: Provides a GUI-based interface for handling user inputs in the game.
Since:
1.0
Version:
1.1

Each view is designed to work with the corresponding controllers to display game information and interact with the player, ensuring a clear separation of concerns and following the MVC pattern.

Author:
Bartosz So≈õnica
